humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions 'Micrometastases carcinomatosae in lymphonodo (No I/XX)' which indicates the presence of metastases in 1 out of 20 assessed axillary lymph nodes. This corresponds to the N1 stage according to the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions 'Micrometastases carcinomatosaee in lymphonodo (No I/XX)' in the section 'AXILLARY LYMPH NODES'. This indicates that cancer has spread to 1 out of 20 (I/XX) axillary lymph nodes, which corresponds to an N1 stage. The substaging information (mi) is not considered for this N stage prediction.
